modWaywardTweaksSmoker: A primitive yet effective food dehydrator.
modWaywardTweaksLitSmoker: A smoker ready to dehydrate and preserve food.

cookedPemmican: Fried meat cake. A filling and nutritious meal.
modWaywardTweaksShreddedMeatBoiled: Boiled meat cake. A comforting, if soggy and bland meal.
modWaywardTweaksSmoker: A primitive yet effective food dehydrator.
modWaywardTweaksTwigBundle: A bunch of twigs portioned out as an efficient log replacement for fire stoking.
pemmican: A cake of dehydrated meat. It will never spoil and is a good travel snack. Prepare with other ingrediants for a more nutritious meal.

message.modWaywardTweaksModWarningToPlayer: Greetings. The Wayward Tweaks mod is experimental. Don't use this with a saved game you care about!
